<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">编程范式（<span lang="EN-US">Programming Paradigm</span>）是某种编程语言典型的编程风格或者说是编程方式。随着编程方法学和软件工程研究的深入，特别是<span lang="EN-US">OO</span>思想的普及，范式（<span lang="EN-US">Paradigm</span>）以及编程范式等术语渐渐出现在人们面前。面向对象编程（<span lang="EN-US">OOP</span>）常常被誉为是一种革命性的思想，正因为它不同于其他的各种编程范式。编程范式也许是学习任何一门编程语言时要理解的最重要的术语。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">托马斯<span lang="EN-US">.</span>库恩提出<span lang="EN-US">“</span>科学的革命<span lang="EN-US">”</span>的范式论之后，<span lang="EN-US">Robert Floyd</span>在<span lang="EN-US">1979</span>年图灵奖的颁奖演说中使用了编程范式一词。编程范式一般包括三个方面，以<span lang="EN-US">OOP</span>为例：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -36pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';"> </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">学科的逻辑体系<span lang="EN-US">——</span>规则范式：如类<span lang="EN-US">/</span>对象、继承、动态绑定、方法改写、对象替换等等机制。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -36pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';"> </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">心理认知因素<span lang="EN-US">——</span>心理范式：按照面向对象编程之父<span lang="EN-US">Alan Kay</span>的观点，<span lang="EN-US">“</span>计算就是模拟<span lang="EN-US">”</span>。<span lang="EN-US">OO</span>范式极其重视隐喻（<span lang="EN-US">metaphor</span>）的价值，通过拟人化，按照自然的方式模拟自然。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -36pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">3<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';"> </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">自然观<span lang="EN-US">/</span>世界观<span lang="EN-US">——</span>观念范式：强调程序的组织技术，视程序为松散耦合的对象<span lang="EN-US">/</span>类的集合，以继承机制将类组织成一个层次结构，把程序运行视为相互服务的对象们之间的对话。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">简单的说，</span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.nowamagic.net/librarys/veda/tag/%E7%BC%96%E7%A8%8B%E8%8C%83%E5%BC%8F"><span lang="ZH-CN" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt;
text-decoration:none;text-underline:none">编程范式</span></a></span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是程序员看待程序应该具有的观点。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">为了进一步加深对编程范式的认识，这里介绍几种最常见的编程范式。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">需要再次提醒注意的是：编程范式是编程语言的一种分类方式，它并不针对某种编程语言。就编程语言而言，一种编程语言也可以适用多种编程范式。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#FF6600;mso-font-kerning:0pt">过程化（命令式）编程<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">过程化编程，也被称为命令式编程，应该是最原始的、也是我们最熟悉的一种传统的编程方式。从本质上讲，它是<span lang="EN-US">“</span>冯<span lang="EN-US">.</span>诺伊曼机<span lang="EN-US">“</span>运行机制的抽象，它的编程思维方式源于计算机指令的顺序排列。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">（也就是说：过程化语言模拟的是计算机机器的系统结构，而并不是基于语言的使用者的个人能力和倾向。这一点我们应该都很清楚，比如：我们最早曾经使用过的单片机的汇编语言。）<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">过程化编程的步骤是：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">首先，我们必须将待解问题的解决方案抽象为一系列概念化的步骤。然后通过编程的方式将这些步骤转化为程序指令集（算法），而这些指令按照一定的顺序排列，用来说明如何执行一个任务或解决一个问题。这就意味着，程序员必须要知道程序要完成什么，并且告诉计算机如何来进行所需的计算工作，包括每个细节操作。简言之，就是将计算机看作一个善始善终服从命令的装置。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">所以在过程化编程中，把待解问题规范化、抽象为某种算法是解决问题的关键步骤。其次，才是编写具体算法和完成相应的算法实现问题的正确解决。当然，程序员对待解问题的抽象能力也是非常重要的因素，但这本身已经与编程语言无关了。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">程序流程图是过程化语言进行程序编写的有效辅助手段。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:green;mso-font-kerning:0pt">尽管现存的计算机编程语言很多，但是人们把所有支持过程化编程范式的编程语言都被归纳为过程化编程语言。例如机器语言、汇编语言、<span lang="EN-US">BASIC</span>、<span lang="EN-US">COBOL</span>、<span lang="EN-US">C </span>、<span lang="EN-US">FORTRAN</span>、语言等等许多第三代编程语言都被归纳为过程化语言。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:maroon;mso-font-kerning:0pt">过程化语言特别适合解决线性（或者说按部就班）的算法问题。它强调<span lang="EN-US">“</span>自上而下（自顶向下）<span lang="EN-US">”“</span>精益求精<span lang="EN-US">”</span>的设计方式。这种方式非常类似我们的工作和生活方式，因为我们的日常活动都是按部就班的顺序进行的。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;background:red;
mso-highlight:red;mso-font-kerning:0pt">过程化语言趋向于开发运行较快且对系统资源利用率较高的程序。</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">过程化语言非常的灵活并强大，同时有许多经典应用范例，这使得程序员可以用它来解决多种问题。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#3366FF;mso-font-kerning:0pt">过程化语言的不足之处就是它不适合某些种类问题的解决，例如那些非结构化的具有复杂算法的问题。问题出现在，过程化语言必须对一个算法加以详尽的说明，并且其中还要包括执行这些指令或语句的顺序。实际上，给那些非结构化的具有复杂算法的问题给出详尽的算法是极其困难的。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">广泛引起争议和讨论的地方是：无条件分支，或<span lang="EN-US">goto</span>语句，它是大多数过程式编程语言的组成部分，反对者声称：<span lang="EN-US">goto</span>语句可能被无限地滥用；它给程序设计提供了制造混
乱的机会。目前达成的共识是将它保留在大多数语言中，对于它所具有的危险性，应该通过程序设计的规定将其最小化。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#FF6600;mso-font-kerning:0pt">事件驱动编程<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">其实，基于事件驱动的程序设计在图形用户界面（<span lang="EN-US">GUI</span>）出现很久前就已经被应用于程序设计中，可是只有当图形用户界面广泛流行时，它才逐渐形演变为一种广泛使用的程序设计模式。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在过程式的程序设计中，代码本身就给出了程序执行的顺序，尽管执行顺序可能会受到程序输入数据的影响。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在事件驱动的程序设计中，程序中的许多部分可能在完全不可预料的时刻被执行。往往这些程序的执行是由用户与正在执行的程序的互动激发所致。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -36pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">•<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';"> </span></span><!--[endif]--><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">事件</span></b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。就是通知某个特定的事情已经发生（事件发生具有随机性）。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -36pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">•<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';"> </span></span><!--[endif]--><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">事件与轮询</span></b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。轮询的行为是不断地观察和判断，是一种无休止的行为方式。而事件是静静地等待事情的发生。事实上，在<span lang="EN-US">Windows</span>出现之前，采用鼠标输入字符模式的<span lang="EN-US">PC</span>应用程序必须进行串行轮询，并以这种方式来查询和响应不同的用户操做。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -36pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">•<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';"> </span></span><!--[endif]--><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">事件处理器</span></b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。是对事件做出响应时所执行的一段程序代码。事件处理器使得程序能够对于用户的行为做出反映。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">事件驱动常常用于用户与程序的交互，通过图形用户接口（鼠标、键盘、触摸板）进行交互式的互动。当然，也可以用于异常的处理和响应用户自定义的事件等等。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">事件的异常处理比用户交互更复杂。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">事件驱动不仅仅局限在<span lang="EN-US">GUI</span>编程应用。但是实现事件驱动我们还需要考虑更多的实际问题，如：事件定义、事件触发、事件转化、事件合并、事件排队、事件分派、事件处理、事
件连带等等。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#3366FF;mso-font-kerning:0pt">其实，到目前为止，我们还没有找到有关纯事件驱动编程的语言和类似的开发环境。所有关于事件驱动的资料都是基于<span lang="EN-US">GUI</span>事件的。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#3366FF;mso-font-kerning:0pt">属于事件驱动的编程语言有：<span lang="EN-US">VB</span>、<span lang="EN-US">C#</span>、<span lang="EN-US">Java</span>（<span lang="EN-US">Java Swing</span>的<span lang="EN-US">GUI</span>）等。它们所涉及的事件绝大多数都是<span lang="EN-US">GUI</span>事件。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#FF6600;mso-font-kerning:0pt">面向对象编程<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">过程化范式要求程序员用按部就班的算法看待每个问题。很显然，并不是每个问题都适合这种过程化的思维方式。这也就导致了其它程序设计范式出现，包括我们现在介绍的面向对象的程序设计范式。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">面向对象的程序设计模式已经出现二十多年，经过这些年的发展，它的设计思想和设计模式已经稳定的进入编程语言的主流。来自<span lang="EN-US">TIOBE Programming Community2010</span>年<span lang="EN-US">11</span>月份编程语言排名的前三名<span lang="EN-US">Java</span>、<span lang="EN-US">C</span>、<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>中，<span lang="EN-US">Java</span>和<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>都是面向对象的编程语言。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">面向对象的程序设计包括了三个基本概念：封装性、继承性、多态性。面向对象的程序语言通过类、方法、对象和消息传递，来支持面向对象的程序设计范式。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 24pt;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1.
</span></b><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">对象</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">世间万事万物都是对象。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#660066;mso-font-kerning:0pt">面向对象的程序设计的抽象机制是将待解问题抽象为面向对象的程序中的对象。利用封装使每个对象都拥有个体的身份。</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;background:lime;
mso-highlight:lime;mso-font-kerning:0pt">程序便是成堆的对象，彼此通过消息的传递，请求其它对象 进行工作。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 24pt;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2.
</span></b><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">类</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">每个对象都是其类中的一个实体。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">物以类聚<span lang="EN-US">——</span>就是说明：类是相似对象的集合。类中的对象可以接受相同的消息。换句话说：类包含和描述了<span lang="EN-US">“</span>具有共同特性（数据元素）和共同行为（功能）<span lang="EN-US">”</span>的一组对象。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">比如：苹果、梨、橘子等等对象都属于水果类。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 24pt;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">3.
</span></b><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">封装</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">封装（有时也被称为信息隐藏）就是把数据和行为结合在一个包中，并对对象的使用者隐藏数据的实现过程。信息隐藏是面向对象编程的基本原则，而封装是实现这一原则的一种方
式。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">封装使对象呈现出<span lang="EN-US">“</span>黑盒子<span lang="EN-US">”</span>特性，这是对象再利用和实现可靠性的关键步骤。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 24pt;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">4.
</span></b><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">接口</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">每个对象都有接口。接口不是类，而是对符合接口需求的类所作的一套规范。接口说明类应该做什么但不指定如何作的方法。一个类可以有一个或多个接口。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 24pt;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">5.
</span></b><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">方法</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">方法决定了某个对象究竟能够接受什么样的消息。面向对象的设计有时也会简单地归纳为<span lang="EN-US">“</span>将消息发送给对象<span lang="EN-US">”</span>。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 24pt;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">6.
</span></b><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">继承</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">继承的思想就是允许在已存在类的基础上构建新的类。一个子类能够继承父类的所有成员，包括属性和方法。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">继承的主要作用：通过实现继承完成代码重用；通过接口继承完成代码被重用。继承是一种规范的技巧，而不是一种实现的技巧。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 24pt;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">7.
</span></b><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#343434;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">多态</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">多态提供了<span lang="EN-US">“</span>接口与实现分离<span lang="EN-US">”</span>。多态不但能改善程序的组织架构及可读性，更利于开发出<span lang="EN-US">“</span>可扩充<span lang="EN-US">”</span>的程序。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">继承是多态的基础。多态是继承的目的。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">合理的运用基于类继承的多态、基于接口继承的多态和基于模版的多态，能增强程序的简洁性、灵活性、可维护性、可重用性和可扩展性。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 24pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.nowamagic.net/librarys/veda/tag/%E9%9D%A2%E5%90%91%E5%AF%B9%E8%B1%A1"><span lang="ZH-CN" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt;
text-decoration:none;text-underline:none">面向对象</span></a></span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">技术一方面借鉴了哲学、心理学、生物学的思考方式，另一方面，它是建立在其他编程技术之上的，是以前的编程思想的自然产物。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#FF6600;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">如果说结构化软件设计是将函数式编程技术应用到命令式语言中进行程序设计，面向对象编程不过是将函数式模型应用到命令式程序中的另一途径，此时，模块进步为对象，过程龟缩到<span lang="EN-US">class</span>的成员方法中。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">OOP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:Georgia;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的很多技术<span lang="EN-US">——</span>抽象数据类型、信息隐藏、接口与实现分离、对象生成功能、消息传递机制等等，很多东西就是结构化软件设计所拥有的、或者在其他编程语言中单独出现。但只有在面向对象语言中，他们才共同出现，以一种独特的合作方式互相协作、互相补充。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-fareast"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
